import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'web-application'; text = 'This is a test for the company'; get textAsArray() { return this.text.split(''); } }
